Message.Msg: Stock markets drop under Republicans FYI.

Message.Title: Michael Jackson Warning From The Grave To Romney: Grease Fires
Message.Msg: Michael's grease loaded hair went up in flames filming a Pepsi commercial. Mitt better watch out he doesn't get his black shoe polish soaked hair under bright lights.

Message.Title: Can a liar like Romney be US president?
Message.Msg: My investment is much safer with Obama.

Topic.Title: Can a liar like Romney be US president?

Message.Msg: Yes ! Because obama been doing it for 4 years 1 by the way romney don't lie ! people like you idiots is what causing america to be weaken , you think you should get every thing free !!!

Message.Title: If Romney win, he will be one term president
Message.Msg: He will have to cut many programs to balance the budget to provide the US with fiscal sanity. People won't like losing the stuff they used to get on borrowed money .

Message.Title: Rocky Balboa v Apollo Creed
Message.Msg: Today's the day. The latest polls estimate that Obama will take the early lead until about 3:30 when the Republicans start to get off work and go vote.

Message.Title: Disaster for the economy and your portfolio if Romney wins
Message.Msg: On the other hand, you will see steady gain with Obama, the same thing you have seen so far. Don't rock the boat and don't try to test an unusual that gives you a rosy garden. Look at the world and global economy and you see how the rest of the world are doing so badly compare to USA.

Message.Title: Obama saved USA and Romney will turn the clock back to Bush's time.
Message.Msg: Go back to late 2008 and compare it to current time. If it was not Obama then we were in a shape worse than Greek, Spain and the rest of the Europe.

Message.Title: Buy IBM today and lock your dividend
Message.Msg: I have feeling that a rush of buyers will be here before the close.

Message.Title: LANDSLIDE
Message.Msg: Romney - FLORIDA, NC, VA, OHIO, PA.

Message.Title: back In
Message.Msg: I bought my IRA shares back at the close. Instead of IBM in my trading account, I stuffed it with AAPL for a short term trade. My finger is on the trigger. I'm hoping for a Romney bounce tomorrow. Good Luck to All

Message.Title: Who wants another irresponsible rich guy like Romney to rob you and give it to other rich guys
Message.Msg: No one. Smart rich men like Buffett do not it either. Because they know that it will BK the country eventually.
Ha Ha, lol We shall see, a Romney win will surely the give the market a bounce.
